channel.title: 1.0.10 on Cray System Management (CSM)
channel.description: Recent content in 1.0.10 on Cray System Management (CSM)

item.title: 1.0.10 Patch Installation Instructions
item.description: CSM 1.0.10 Patch Installation Instructions Introduction This document is intended to guide an administrator through the process going to Cray Systems Management v1.0.10 from v1.0.1. If you are at an earlier version, you must first upgrade to at least v1.0.1. For information on how to do that, see Upgrade CSM. Steps Preparation Setup Nexus Upgrade Services Rollout Deployment Restart Apply Pod Priorities Verification Run NCN Personalization Exit Typescript Preparation Start a typescript on ncn-m001 to capture the commands and output from this procedure.
